text:
Company: Campbell-Henson

Role: Economic Analyst

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:
Campbell-Henson is seeking a highly skilled Economic Analyst to join our team. As an Economic Analyst, you will be responsible for analyzing and interpreting economic data to inform business decisions. You will work closely with our team of experts to identify trends, opportunities, and challenges, and develop recommendations to drive business growth.

Responsibilities:
- Analyze economic data and trends to identify opportunities and challenges
- Develop and maintain economic models and forecasts
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop business strategies
- Communicate complex economic data to non-technical stakeholders
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and developments

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Economics, Finance, or related field
- 2+ years of experience in economic analysis or related field
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Recognition and rewards for outstanding performance
